Options like cutting diplomatic ties (L) and imposing trade restrictions (M) may escalate tensions unnecessarily. Finally, full-scale military actions (Q, R, S) and high-stakes offensive measures are not only impractical but could lead to catastrophic consequences, thus ranking them the least reasonable.
